title: ふわふわ、キラキラ、あこがれは

text.jpText:
『ジャパンC』に向け、ストイックに
鍛えていたある日。丸眼鏡の記者から
マチカネタンホイザ宛てに手紙が届く。
text.enText:
One day, while stoically working out for the 
"Japan C," a reporter with round glasses 
asked me if I was interested in the "Japan C. 
One day, a letter arrives from a reporter 
with round glasses A letter arrives from a 
reporter with round glasses addressed to 
Machikane Tannhäuser.

text.jpText:
手紙には、何度も励まされてきたこと。
もしマチカネタンホイザが特別な子だったら、
ここまで励まされなかったということ。
text.enText:
The letters have been encouraging on 
many occasions. That if Machikanetanhoyza 
had been a special child I would not 
have been so encouraged.

text.jpText:
だから貴方は私の『主人公』なんだという
感謝が綴られていた。その手紙から、
秋川理事長の『君だからこそ背を押せる』――
text.enText:
The letter was a thank-you note, saying that 
you are my "hero" because of this. From that 
letter. Chancellor Akikawa's "Because it's 
you, I can push back"―

text.jpText:
その言葉の意味を理解する。自分も
『主人公』になれるのならばなりたい。可能
ならもっと多くの人にとっての『主人公』に！
text.enText:
I understand the meaning of those words. 
If I could be a "hero", I would. If possible, 
I want to be a "hero" for more people! 
If possible, I would like to be a "hero" 
for more people!

text.jpText:
そんな新たな夢は彼女を強く突き動かす。
記者会見では『ジャパンC』で『主人公』に
なると宣言し、大きな期待を寄せられる！
text.enText:
Such a new dream strongly motivates her. At 
the press conference, she declared that she 
would be the "hero" in "Japan C"! She 
declared at the press conference that she 
would be the "hero" of the "Japan C", and 
high expectations were pinned on her!
